entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -10.3°C

entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High minus 6. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 6. Wind chill near minus 14. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Snow. Low minus 17.
entry.summary: Snow. Local blowing snow this evening and after midnight. Amount 5 to 10 cm except 2 cm in areas east of Red Deer. Wind becoming east 30 km/h gusting to 50 this evening. Low minus 17. Wind chill minus 13 this evening and minus 25 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Periods of snow. High minus 16 with temperature falling to minus 19 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 16 with temperature falling to minus 19 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 22 in the morning and minus 28 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Monday 20 February 2023
